text:
Pada akhirnya Anna meminta maaf, tidak ingin membuat anaknya merajuk.
"Ra, adek kalau main keluar di hari minggu itu biasanya emang suka lama. Paling cepet biasanya dia pulang jam 7 malam."
Rora mengernyit. "Iyakah? Kok malem banget?"
Anna mengangguk. "Iya, sayang. Adek emang gitu. Mami juga gak suka ngelarang-ngelarang adek, selama dia gak aneh-aneh Mami gak masalah kalau dia mainnya lama."
"Udah gak usah ditungguin adeknya, mending kamu mandi dulu sana udah sore."
Rora mendengus. "Bentar Mami, nanti juga Rora pasti mandi."
"Nanti-nanti terus kamu kalau disuruh mandi."
"Males, Mam."
Anna hanya bisa pasrah melihat kelakuan Rora. Tak lagi heran bila mengingat Rora yang memang sangat mageran.
"Mam."
"Hmm?"
"Kok Mami santai banget sih adek pulang semalem itu? Emang gak khawatir? Kan udah malem Mi, adek juga masih kecil."
trans:
In the end, Anna apologized, not wanting to upset her daughter.
“Ra, your little sister usually plays outside on Sundays for a long time. The earliest she usually comes home is around 7 PM.”
Rora frowned. “Really? Why so late?”
Anna nodded. “Yes, sweetheart. That’s just how she is. I don’t like to forbid her; as long as she’s not doing anything strange, I don’t mind if she plays for a long time.”
“Don’t wait for her anymore; you should take a shower first since it’s already evening.”
Rora huffed. “Just a minute, Mommy, I’ll shower later.”
“You always say you’ll do it later when I ask you to shower.”
“I don’t want to, Mom.”
Anna could only surrender, watching Rora’s behavior. She was no longer surprised, remembering how lazy Rora could be.
“Mom.”
“Hmm?”
“Why were Mommy so calm when your sister came home last night? Aren’t you worried? It was already late, and she’s still so young.”
